definitions.definition: Coming one after the other in a series .
examples: They had won the title for five successive years.

definitions.definition: Of, or relating to a succession ; hereditary .
Of or relating to the grammatical aspect which presupposes the completion of a secondary action as a premise for the primary action of the statement.

main_definition: Coming one after the other in a series .
secondary_definitions: Of, or relating to a succession ; hereditary .
( grammar ) Of or relating to the grammatical aspect which presupposes the completion of a secondary action as a premise for the primary action of the statement.
